statements: DELETE FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 100 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE critical_threshold < 5 AND item_name LIKE 'A%';
DELETE FROM critical_inventory_items WHERE item_id = 100 AND item_quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM notification_triggers WHERE item_id IN (SELECT item_id FROM critical_inventory_items WHERE item_quantity < 5);
DELETE FROM critical_items WHERE current_inventory <= critical_inventory_level * 0.5;
DELETE FROM user_notifications WHERE user_id = 5 AND notification_id = 2;
DELETE FROM user_notifications WHERE user_id = 100 AND notification_id = 200;
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE message = 'Low inventory level';
